For Lottery B, there is 1 outcome, so any outcome is considered probable since its probability is 100%, which is higher than 1/1 or 100%.

For Lottery B, the only outcome is 2400 Euros, which is considered probable.

The average of probable outcomes for Lottery B is 2400 Euros.
